name: Silver Bolts
description: Fire a Dawnguard Vampire Hunter's crossbow bolt at an enemy, dealing Magic Damage. Deals 230% more damage to Undead and Daedra and stuns them for 3.5 seconds.

name: Silver Shards
description: Fire a spray of silver shards at enemies in front of you, dealing Magic Damage. Deals 230% more damage to Undead and Daedra and stuns them for 3.5 seconds.

name: Silver Leash
description: Fire a crossbow bolt at an enemy, dealing Magic Damage. Deals 230% more damage to Undead and Daedra and stuns them for 3.5 seconds. Activating again pulls the enemy to you.

effects.description: Pull enemy to you on second activation

name: Circle of Protection
description: Create a rune of protection on the ground for 20 seconds. You and your allies in the rune gain Minor Protection and Minor Endurance, reducing damage taken by 5% and increasing Stamina Recovery by 15%.

name: Turn Undead
description: Create a rune of protection on the ground for 20 seconds. You and your allies in the rune gain Minor Protection and Minor Endurance. When activated, the rune also fears Undead and Daedra for 4 seconds.

name: Ring of Preservation
description: Create a rune of protection on the ground for 20 seconds. You and your allies in the rune gain Minor Protection and Minor Endurance. The rune also heals you and your allies every 2 seconds.

name: Expert Hunter
description: Invoke your expertise in monster hunting to reveal stealthed and invisible enemies around you for 5 seconds. While slotted, you gain Major Savagery, increasing your Weapon Critical rating by 2629.

name: Evil Hunter
description: Invoke your expertise in monster hunting to reveal stealthed and invisible enemies around you for 5 seconds. While slotted, you gain Major Savagery. Also increases your damage against Undead and Daedra by 9%.

name: Camouflaged Hunter
description: Invoke your expertise in monster hunting to reveal stealthed and invisible enemies around you for 5 seconds. While slotted, you gain Major Savagery. Your next attack from Crouch deals 10% more damage.

name: Trap Beast
description: Set a trap at your location that arms after 1.5 seconds. When triggered, the trap deals Physical Damage, immobilizes the enemy for 2 seconds, and grants you Minor Force for 12 seconds, increasing Critical Damage by 10%.

name: Rearming Trap
description: Set a trap at your location that arms after 1.5 seconds. When triggered, the trap deals Physical Damage, immobilizes the enemy for 2 seconds, and grants you Minor Force for 12 seconds. The trap resets after being triggered.

name: Lightweight Beast Trap
description: Hurl a trap at a target location that arms after 1.5 seconds. When triggered, the trap deals Physical Damage, immobilizes the enemy for 2 seconds, and grants you Minor Force for 12 seconds.

name: Dawnbreaker
description: Arm yourself with Meridia's sacred sword and strike down enemies in front of you, dealing Magic Damage to all enemies and additional Magic Damage over 6 seconds. Deals 300% more damage to Undead and Daedra.

name: Flawless Dawnbreaker
description: Arm yourself with Meridia's sacred sword and strike down enemies in front of you, dealing Magic Damage and additional Magic Damage over 6 seconds. While slotted, gain 3% increased Weapon Damage.

name: Dawnbreaker of Smiting
description: Arm yourself with Meridia's sacred sword and strike down enemies in front of you, dealing Magic Damage, knocking them down for 2 seconds, and additional Magic Damage over 6 seconds.

name: Intimidating Presence I
description: Allows you to intimidate NPCs in conversation. Guild members report information on the proximity of Undead, Daedra, and Werewolves on your compass within 30 meters.

name: Slayer I
description: Increases your Weapon and Spell Damage by 1% for each Fighters Guild ability slotted.

name: Slayer II
description: Increases your Weapon and Spell Damage by 2% for each Fighters Guild ability slotted.

name: Slayer III
description: Increases your Weapon and Spell Damage by 3% for each Fighters Guild ability slotted.

name: Banish the Wicked I
description: Grants you 1 Ultimate when you kill an Undead, Daedra, or Werewolf.

name: Banish the Wicked II
description: Grants you 2 Ultimate when you kill an Undead, Daedra, or Werewolf.

name: Banish the Wicked III
description: Grants you 3 Ultimate when you kill an Undead, Daedra, or Werewolf.

name: Skilled Tracker I
description: Reduces the cooldown of your Fighters Guild abilities by 5%.

name: Skilled Tracker II
description: Reduces the cooldown of your Fighters Guild abilities by 10%.

name: Skilled Tracker III
description: Reduces the cooldown of your Fighters Guild abilities by 15%.

name: Bounty Hunter I
description: Increases your Health, Stamina, and Magicka by 1% for each Fighters Guild ability slotted.

name: Bounty Hunter II
description: Increases your Health, Stamina, and Magicka by 2% for each Fighters Guild ability slotted.

name: Bounty Hunter III
description: Increases your Health, Stamina, and Magicka by 3% for each Fighters Guild ability slotted.

name: Magelight
description: Summon a mote of magelight to reveal stealthed and invisible enemies in a 12 meter radius for 5 seconds. While slotted, you gain Major Prophecy, increasing your Spell Critical rating by 2629.

name: Inner Light
description: Summon a mote of magelight to reveal stealthed and invisible enemies in a 12 meter radius for 5 seconds. While slotted, you gain Major Prophecy and increases your Max Magicka by 5%.

name: Radiant Magelight
description: Summon a mote of magelight to reveal stealthed and invisible enemies in a 12 meter radius for 5 seconds. While slotted, you gain Major Prophecy and reduces the effectiveness of enemy stealth attacks against you by 50%.

name: Entropy
description: Bind an enemy with chaotic magic, dealing Magic Damage over 20 seconds. While active, you gain Major Sorcery, increasing your Spell Damage by 20%.

name: Degeneration
description: Bind an enemy with chaotic magic, dealing Magic Damage over 20 seconds. While active, you gain Major Sorcery. Dealing Critical Damage heals you.

name: Structured Entropy
description: Bind an enemy with chaotic magic, dealing Magic Damage over 20 seconds. While active, you gain Major Sorcery and increases your Max Health by 8%.

name: Fire Rune
description: Inscribe a rune on the ground that arms after 2 seconds. When triggered, the rune explodes, dealing Flame Damage to all enemies nearby and stunning them for 3.5 seconds.

name: Volcanic Rune
description: Inscribe a rune on the ground that arms after 2 seconds. When triggered, the rune explodes, dealing Flame Damage to all enemies nearby, stunning them for 3.5 seconds, and knocking them into the air.

name: Scalding Rune
description: Inscribe a rune on the ground that arms after 2 seconds. When triggered, the rune explodes, dealing Flame Damage to all enemies nearby and additional Flame Damage over 8 seconds.

name: Equilibrium
description: Convert your Health into Magicka. You also gain Major Resolve for 20 seconds, increasing your Physical and Spell Resistance by 5948.

name: Spell Symmetry
description: Convert your Health into Magicka. You also gain Major Resolve for 20 seconds. Reduces the cost of your next Magicka ability by 25%.

name: Balance
description: Convert your Health into Magicka. You also gain Major Resolve for 20 seconds. Grants you Major Ward and Major Resolve with increased duration.

name: Meteor
description: Call a comet down from the sky to strike an enemy, dealing Flame Damage to all enemies in the area and additional Flame Damage over 10 seconds. Also knocks back enemies and stuns them for 2 seconds.

name: Ice Comet
description: Call a comet of ice down from the sky to strike an enemy, dealing Frost Damage to all enemies in the area and additional Frost Damage over 10 seconds. Also knocks back enemies and stuns them for 2 seconds.

name: Shooting Star
description: Call a comet down from the sky to strike an enemy, dealing Flame Damage to all enemies in the area and additional Flame Damage over 10 seconds. You gain 12 Ultimate for each enemy hit.

name: Persuasive Passive I
description: Allows you to persuade NPCs in conversation.

name: Mage Adept I
description: Reduces the cost of Mages Guild abilities by 5%.

name: Mage Adept II
description: Reduces the cost of Mages Guild abilities by 10%.

name: Mage Adept III
description: Reduces the cost of Mages Guild abilities by 15%.

name: Everlasting Magic I
description: Increases the duration of Mages Guild abilities by 5%.

name: Everlasting Magic II
description: Increases the duration of Mages Guild abilities by 10%.

name: Everlasting Magic III
description: Increases the duration of Mages Guild abilities by 15%.

name: Magicka Controller I
description: Increases your Max Magicka and Magicka Recovery by 1% for each Mages Guild ability slotted.

name: Magicka Controller II
description: Increases your Max Magicka and Magicka Recovery by 2% for each Mages Guild ability slotted.

name: Magicka Controller III
description: Increases your Max Magicka and Magicka Recovery by 3% for each Mages Guild ability slotted.

name: Might of the Guild I
description: Using a Mages Guild ability grants you Empower for 5 seconds, increasing the damage of your next Light or Heavy Attack by 40%.

name: Might of the Guild II
description: Using a Mages Guild ability grants you Empower for 7 seconds, increasing the damage of your next Light or Heavy Attack by 40%.

name: Might of the Guild III
description: Using a Mages Guild ability grants you Empower for 10 seconds, increasing the damage of your next Light or Heavy Attack by 40%.
